review: This is one of the niftiest items I've used to facilitate computer-to-TV streaming video.  It's very small and weighs a couple of ounces; it's easy to use and makes movie watching a breeze.
author: bonnie brooklyn girl

review: Best gift I ever bought my husband. He loves the easy access to all the free Amazon Prime content on his flat screen (though not a smart tv). He had been systematically working his way through all the HBO episodes he missed. Now if I could only get him to watch while on the treadmill instead of in a recliner.....
author: Gia Mom "Busy Mom"

review: We have a smart TV in my granddaughters room that includes Amazon Instant Videos and other stuff. We also have a WII attached to 1 TV in the master bedroom that allows us to access Amazon Instant Videos. We used to move the WII between the master bedroom TV & big screen TV in the family room and that was a pain. Now we have the Fire TV Stick in the family room on the big screen and its NICE!! We have not had any problems with it. I downloaded the Fire TV Stick remote app to my cell phone and it works. We can now jump from room to room and keep watch Amazon videos.
author: Read Salot "Read Salot"

review: I have the Roku box.  But I find it always freezes up on me.  Always have to reset the remote.  After reading the reviews on the Fire TV stick, I have decided to try it.  The stick is fantastic, no more freezing up and no more Roku for me.  Thanks!
author: Helen S
